data.name: Crystal Plague
data.detailed_description:
In a remote remote village, a local alchemist went mad and decided that he would save everyone. Forced. And for this he will use the reserves of magic crystals that are in the caves nearby. His crazy experiments gave birth to the crystal plague - a disease that devours the living and perverts the dead.

Use alchemical bombs, magic seals and a faithful blade to cut through hordes of monsters to the depths of the caves and destroy the madman. With each enemy you kill you gain invaluable experience and with each floor you pass, you get a new opportunity to enhance your abilities.

Be careful if you die you will have to start over. At least some of the knowledge will remain with you.

data.short_description: Dynamic and tough action-roguelike in dark fantasy style. Use magic, alchemy and tactical thinking to break through rooms full of traps and monsters. Choose new skills with each level, improve your weapons with each room to break into the depths of the crystal mine and destroy bosses. Again.
